com.crossover.techtrial.service

Interface ArticleService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArticleServiceImpl

    public interface ArticleService
    This interface provides all methods to access the functionality of an Article. see ArticleServiceImpl for implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(java.lang.Long id)
      Delete a particular article with id.
      Article findById(java.lang.Long id)
      Find the specific article by his Id.
      Article save(Article article)
      Save an article.
      java.util.List<Article> search(java.lang.String title)
      Search Articles Table matching the title and return result.
